title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can login successfully with valid email and password for different roles and are redirected to their respective dashboards.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password for a super_admin user
Click login button
Verify login succeeds and user is redirected to super_admin dashboard
Logout and repeat with valid owner credentials
Verify login succeeds and user is redirected to owner dashboard
Logout and repeat for admin, kasir, kitchen, and waiter roles similarly
Verify login success and dashboard redirection matches user role

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and displays appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid email with any password
Click login button
Verify error message for incorrect credentials is displayed
Input valid email with wrong password
Click login button
Verify error message for incorrect credentials is displayed
Attempt login with empty email and password fields
Verify form validation messages for required fields are shown

title: Role-based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users cannot access pages or functionalities beyond their role permissions.

steps.description: Login as kasir and attempt to access employee management page
Verify access is denied or redirected
Login as kitchen and try to create a business record
Verify action is blocked due to insufficient permission
Login as super_admin and access all pages
Verify full access to all features and modules
Verify API endpoints enforce role-based permissions by attempting unauthorized requests
API returns 403 Forbidden for unauthorized roles

title: Multi-Business and Multi-Outlet Switching
description: Verify user can switch between multiple businesses and outlets and that data updates accordingly.

steps.description: Login as user assigned to multiple businesses and outlets
Switch to a different business from UI control
Verify dashboard and data updates to selected business context
Switch to a different outlet within the chosen business
Verify stock, orders, and reports display data for selected outlet
Perform transactions in switched outlet and confirm data consistency
Verify that stock levels and sales data correspond to the correct business and outlet

title: POS Transaction Flow Cashier Mode
description: Verify completing a POS transaction from product selection to receipt and notification in Cashier mode.

steps.description: Login as kasir and open Cashier POS
Search and add multiple products to cart using barcode and manual search
Verify products are correctly added with correct quantities and prices
Hold the order and then recall it
Verify order is saved and recalled accurately with all items intact
Select payment method: Cash
Complete the transaction
Verify stock is decremented appropriately for products sold
Verify receipt is printed and WhatsApp payment notification is sent automatically
Repeat transaction using credit card and e-wallet payment methods
Verify payment status is tracked correctly with Midtrans integration

title: POS Transaction Flow Kitchen Mode Order Processing
description: Verify kitchen POS handles order status updates and displays correct order information for kitchen staff.

steps.description: Login as kitchen user and open Kitchen POS
View incoming orders with correct product details and modifiers
Change order status through preparation stages (e.g. cooking, ready)
Verify status updates persist and reflect in order management and waiter POS
Attempt to update or cancel orders not assigned to outlet
Verify access denied or action blocked

title: Product Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify Create, Read, Update, Delete operations on products including categories, variants, and stock per outlet.

steps.description: Login as admin or owner and navigate to product management
Create new product with multiple variants and category assignments
Verify product is created and visible in product list with correct details
Edit product details including price, images, stock per outlet
Verify updates persist and display correctly
Attempt to delete product that has pending orders
Verify system prevents deletion and shows appropriate error
Search for products using keywords and barcode
Verify search results are accurate and performance is within acceptable limits
Upload invalid image formats for product
Verify validation errors are shown and upload is rejected

title: Inventory Stock Alerts and Movements
description: Verify real-time stock tracking, low stock alerts, and ability to transfer stock between outlets.

steps.description: Simulate sales to decrement stock below alert thresholds
Verify low stock alert notifications appear in inventory management dashboard
Perform stock transfer from one outlet to another
Verify stock levels update correctly on both source and destination outlets
Attempt stock transfer with insufficient source stock
Verify transfer is blocked and error message displayed

title: Employee Attendance with GPS Validation
description: Verify attendance clock in/out records with GPS location validation and proper shift assignment.

steps.description: Login as employee and navigate to attendance page
Attempt clock in outside of valid GPS location
Verify attendance is rejected with proper message
Clock in within valid GPS location and select correct shift
Verify attendance record is created with timestamp and GPS coordinates
Clock out and verify attendance duration is computed correctly
Generate attendance report with filters by date and employee
Verify report accuracy and export functionality to PDF and Excel

title: Financial Management and Reporting
description: Verify cash flow tracking, expense recording, tax management, and financial report generation.

steps.description: Login as admin or owner and navigate to financial management
Record new financial transactions including income, expenses, and taxes
Verify transactions are recorded with correct categories and amounts
Generate cash flow report and verify data correctness
Generate tax reports with correct aggregation
Verify reports match expected financial data
Export financial reports to PDF and Excel formats
Verify export files are generated correctly and data is accurate

title: Report Generation and Export Functionality
description: Verify all report types can be generated with filters and exported to PDF and Excel correctly.

steps.description: Login and open reports section
Select Sales Summary report and apply date filters
Verify report displays accurate aggregated data and charts
Export the Sales Summary report to PDF
Verify exported PDF contains all report data and charts correctly formatted
Export the Sales Summary report to Excel
Verify Excel file contains correct tabular data
Repeat report generation and export for all other report types (Cashier Performance, Inventory Status, Attendance Report, etc.)
Verify all exports are accurate and formatting consistent

title: WhatsApp Notification Integration
description: Verify automated WhatsApp notifications after transactions and the ability to send/test custom messages.

steps.description: Complete a POS transaction successfully
Verify payment receipt notification is sent automatically via WhatsApp to configured number
Test WhatsApp notification sending from outlet settings
Verify test notification is sent and received successfully
Send a custom WhatsApp message using multi-provider support
Verify message delivery status and content correctness
Attempt notification with invalid API keys or configuration
Verify system handles errors gracefully and logs failures

title: Subscription Management and Billing
description: Verify subscription plan creation, usage tracking and billing processes for multi-tenant setup.

steps.description: Create subscription plans with different tiers and pricing
Verify plans are listed and selectable in subscription management
Assign subscriptions to businesses or tenants
Verify usage is tracked correctly against subscribed plan limits
Generate billing invoices for active subscriptions
Verify invoice data accuracy and generation
Test handling of expired or cancelled subscriptions
Verify access restrictions and notifications for expired subscriptions

title: API Performance and Response Time
description: Verify API endpoints meet performance requirements with response times under 1 second under load.

steps.description: Perform API calls to login, product list, order creation, and report generation endpoints at normal load
Verify response times are under 1 second
Simulate concurrent requests (100 users) performing critical API calls
Verify backend remains stable and response time averages remain within acceptable limits
Verify page load times in frontend are under 3 seconds for key pages
Confirm no UI freezes or errors occur during load

title: Form Input Validation and Error Handling
description: Verify all forms validate input correctly based on schemas and display appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Open login form and submit with empty fields
Verify required field validation messages appear
Open product creation form and enter invalid data types in price and stock fields
Verify validation messages prevent submission
Try to create product with missing required fields
Form refuses submission and highlights errors
Test similar validation behavior for attendance, order, finance, and subscription forms
All forms enforce proper validation and user-friendly error display

title: Refund Handling via Payment Gateway Midtrans
description: Verify that refunds can be initiated, processed, and tracked correctly with Midtrans payment gateway integration.

steps.description: Complete a transaction using Midtrans payment gateway
Initiate a refund request from order management
Verify refund request is sent and acknowledged by Midtrans
Track refund status until completion
Verify refund status updates in system and reflected correctly
Attempt refund on non-refundable or invalid orders
Verify system blocks refund and shows error message

title: Dashboard Role-based Data Display
description: Verify that each user role sees correct dashboards with relevant statistics and quick action panels.

steps.description: Login as super_admin and verify dashboard includes all statistics and management quick actions
Dashboard data matches comprehensive business metrics
Login as kasir and verify dashboard focuses on sales and ongoing transactions
Dashboard components relevant to cashier role are visible and functional
Login as kitchen and waiter roles, verify respective dashboards show order statuses and assigned tables
Dashboards show accurate real-time information for roles

title: Order Hold and Recall Functionality
description: Verify that orders can be put on hold and recalled correctly in POS systems.

steps.description: Start new order in Cashier POS and add multiple products
Put the order on hold
Verify order is saved with all details and marked as held
Recall the held order from list
Verify order appears with all previous items and is editable
Attempt to place a new hold with invalid or incomplete order data
Verify system blocks hold and prompts for correction

title: Employee Role and Outlet Assignment Management
description: Verify that admins can assign roles and outlets to employees and changes reflect correctly.

steps.description: Login as admin and open employee management
Create a new employee and assign role casier and specific outlet
Verify employee appears in list with correct role and outlet
Update existing employee to multiple outlet assignments and different role
Verify updates persist and user permissions are updated accordingly
Try to assign invalid or duplicate roles
Verify system validates role assignment and rejects invalid entries

title: API Authentication and Authorization
description: Verify that API endpoints enforce authentication and restrict access based on user session and permissions.

steps.description: Attempt API calls to protected endpoints without authentication token
Verify 401 Unauthorized responses
Login and obtain valid authentication token
Access API endpoints with valid token and authorized role
Verify successful data response
Attempt access to restricted endpoints with token of unauthorized role
Verify 403 Forbidden responses
Logout and attempt same requests
Verify authentication is required and token invalidated
